li.label: atheist
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has no use for religious superstition, and would prefer to focus on living [PAWN_possessive] life to the fullest, rather than worrying about being judged for an imaginary afterlife.

li.label: pious
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a devout follower of the teachings of Valerian the Wise, and believes that pious, industrious Mousekins who perform good deeds and respect the sanctity of their bodies will be rewarded with a peaceful afterlife in The Great Garden. [PAWN_pronoun] will work harder than most of [PAWN_possessive] fellow Mousekins, and press on even under the greatest of hardships.
